text: The course is very well structured and follows a logical flow from the BI 1 and BI 2. All steps outlined in KDD are covered throughout the course, and I have learnt a lot about data pipeline, pre-processing, training and deploying models. I think that every topic was explained in-depth, which helped me gain understanding about concepts that I would not have been able to achieve if I worked independently. I also enjoyed the lab tasks as they helped me understand the concepts more practically and enhanced the way I approached different problems. The lecturer is also very organised, in terms of both notes and assigning coursework, and knowledgeable, which I think enhanced the learning experience overall. In my opinion, more labs should be assigned to individuals (or slightly smaller groups) if possible. I think this will help learners in future classes be a little more independent and learn more from the labs.
